title: Bitcoin Bounces Off Support, Solana Enters Overbought Territory
description: Market Overview The crypto market capitalisation has declined by 1.4% over the past 24 hours to $3.9 trillion. At the end of Monday, pressure on Bitcoin spread to the market, halting growth in several altcoins. The sentiment index remains at a comfortable level of 72, just short of the extreme greed zone.
